title: Looking for Players to Party with on Bonus IP Weeken (300% IP for 5 player teams)
body: Leveling a smurf, running ip/exp boosts per win. Looking for others to play with to get that bonus ip and as many wins as quickly as possible. Come smash out some games I'll be online constantly.

replies.body:
yeeep ill do it
add me
